DOC.brief_summary: To assess feasibility success endoscopic ultrasound ( EUS ) direct biliary stone removal without use fluoroscopy . Success study define successful removal stone bile duct without use fluoroscopy . Fluoroscopy use end presume successful procedure confirm stone remove .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Endoscopic Ultrasound Based Biliary Stone Removal Without Fluoroscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients able give inform consent Patients refer IES endoscopic evaluation treatment suspect bile duct stone Patients > 3 bile duct stone stone > 12mm EUS Patients bile duct stone EUS Patients alter biliary anatomy ( periampullary diverticulum , anomalous pancreatibiliary junction , alter surgical anatomy ) Patients pregnant breastfeeding
